column1: Feeling like you are doomed for all of eternity to be trapped in an unhappy adulterous relationship,working on a goddamn house. Which will never be just the way you want it.
Kathy Bates sporting a biker beard.
Masturbating and following it up with an ugly cry.
The ancient french maid who is sexy in your eyes.
The desperate, old, wrinkly, washed up Elsa Mars.
The ever so considerate Edward Mordrake.
